Title: Incorrect Docstring
Content:
To improve the readability of the codebase, consider correcting the [docstring](https://github.com/MorpheusAIs/SmartContracts/blob/5e1222e8c31731cf230c2e3b709683b10a5c1b0e/contracts/interfaces/IMOROFT.sol#L9) above the `IMOROFT` interface, which states that the token is capped, however, this is not reflected in the implementation of the [`MOROFT` contract](https://github.com/MorpheusAIs/SmartContracts/blob/5e1222e8c31731cf230c2e3b709683b10a5c1b0e/contracts/MOROFT.sol).


***Update:** Resolved in [pull request #28](https://github.com/MorpheusAIs/SmartContracts/pull/28) at commit [95b4217](https://github.com/MorpheusAIs/SmartContracts/pull/28/commits/95b4217e30fb82a59ae87377f645b5b92364e5f8).*
